text: Sæge me hwær wære gecweden ærest, alleluia.
Ic þe secge betwih twam dunum,Tabor et Ermon, þær Dauid cwæþ ærest alleluia.
Þonne tacniaþ ða duna þa nywen æ & þa ealdan æ.
Sæge me hwæt þæt word sy alleluia.

Ic þe secge hu mycel þu in þam anum worde benemnest þonne we cweþað alleluia þonne cweþe we leoht þam gode anum & mannum gode licigendum & lof gode & leoht þam soþan & þam leohtan gode & þam soþan gode & þam heahstan gode lof eallum sawlum & lof eallum ænglum mid criste & lof urum drihtne.
Þæt an word is of hisxiinaman gesetted.
Þonne we singaþ alleluia þonne lofiaþ we fæder & sunu & þone halgan gast.
Þonne we singaþ alleluia þonne cweþe we leoht & mægen & hælo þam ælmihtigan gode.
Þonne we singaþ alleluia þonne cweþe we he wæs aa & nu aa biþ & he is friþ & ende & he is lifigend in eallum circum, Amen.
